title: NERF KHA' ZIX
body:
I think Kha zix is way too op. With the ad Jungle item, Tiamat and Last whisper he does 600 dmg with a single q! And that is just Hilarious i dont know but he just needs his Q and 1 point in his ult to upgrade his  Q to Kill every one onehit. In my opinion he is oper than Ekko right now. You need maybe the whole team to kill him, and after that he got a pentakill. Its just hilarious!
Thank you Riot.

replies.body: first: soory(hi for  bad english) kha zix only way to deal dmg is his Q and his auto attacks and his Q range is ~500
Kha its not op i think more he need a little buff  ^^

Brudi, der wurde schon tot generft.
Kannst froh sein, dass der überhaupt noch teilweise viable ist.

First: This is the german forum, write in german or go to the english forum pages.
Second: Look at his winrate, its currently 50,05% following champion.gg - Maybe the most balanced champ of all! If you think he's op, ban him or play him, he's nearly never banned from what i know. If you dont build armor and/or get isolated without pink wards versus a Kha its your own fault.
Greetings, RosaroterTeddy
